title: PM witnesses signing of MoUs to expand Pak-China cooperation
content:
BEIJING, Jun 6 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday witnessed signing of various Memorandums of Understanding (MoUs) to expand cooperation in different fields between China and Pakistan.
On the occasion, an MoU was signed between Pakistan and China regarding manufacturing of solar panels and YTO trackers.
The MoU was signed between Pakistanâ€™s Habib Rafique Limtied and Beijing Global Hydrogen Industries Company Limited.
Another MoU was signed between the Pakistan Investment Board and the Institute of Structural Economics, Peking University, to promote the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor (CPEC).
